theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproductive Hormone and Cell Cycle Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on aging driven by dysregulation of reproductive hormones and cell cycle signaling, linking reproductive axis homeostasis to somatic maintenance trade-offs.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproductive Hormone and Cell Cycle Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Centers on reproductive system aging as a biomarker and its coupling to organismal aging via hormonal and fertility changes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproductive Hormone and Cell Cycle Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes reproductive senescence including fertility and maternal-effect senescence, emphasizing reproductive aging's impact on somatic aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproductive Hormone and Cell Cycle Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights oxidative stress as a mediator of the cost of reproduction, linking reproductive effort to somatic damage accumulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproductive Hormone and Cell Cycle Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on early-life reproductive effort trade-offs leading to accelerated somatic senescence and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproductive Hormone and Cell Cycle Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes male reproductive effort trade-offs with somatic maintenance, linking reproductive investment to accelerated aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproductive Hormone and Cell Cycle Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes soma as disposable supporting germline, with resource allocation favoring reproduction over somatic maintenance.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproductive Hormone and Cell Cycle Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on trade-offs between soma and germ line, with genetic repression of germ line to favor somatic maintenance.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproductive Hormone and Cell Cycle Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Explores trade-offs between reproduction and immune maintenance, linking reproductive investment to immunosenescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproductive Hormone and Cell Cycle Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Connects reproductive investment to telomere shortening as an adaptive somatic maintenance trade-off.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproductive Hormone and Cell Cycle Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Proposes programmed repression of stress responses at reproduction onset, linking reproduction to reduced somatic maintenance.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproductive Hormone and Cell Cycle Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Classic resource allocation trade-off between reproduction and somatic maintenance explaining aging evolution.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproductive Hormone and Cell Cycle Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes environmental modulation of resource allocation between reproduction and maintenance affecting aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproductive Hormone and Cell Cycle Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Summarizes resource allocation trade-off as central to disposable soma aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Classic Disposable Soma Theory of Somatic Maintenance Trade-offs
theory_assignments.reasoning: Foundational theory emphasizing resource allocation trade-offs between reproduction and somatic maintenance leading to damage accumulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Classic Disposable Soma Theory of Somatic Maintenance Trade-offs
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on evolutionary basis of aging via resource allocation and calorie restriction as adaptive somatic maintenance.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Classic Disposable Soma Theory of Somatic Maintenance Trade-offs
theory_assignments.reasoning: Energetic trade-off model linking metabolic energy allocation between growth and maintenance to damage accumulation and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Classic Disposable Soma Theory of Somatic Maintenance Trade-offs
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes accumulation of protein damage and impaired degradation due to limited somatic maintenance.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Pathway Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details conserved IIS pathway regulating lifespan via insulin receptor and FOXO transcription factors.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Pathway Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Shows IIS pathway modulation extends lifespan and stress resistance, highlighting genetic and pharmacological regulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Pathway Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on genetic regulation of lifespan via IIS and DAF-16/FOXO transcription factor interactions.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Pathway Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Demonstrates IIS pathway's role in stress resistance and longevity through downstream stress response genes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Pathway Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights evolutionary conservation of IIS pathway in aging and its integration with environmental signals.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Classic Disposable Soma Theory of Somatic Maintenance Trade-offs
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes energy allocation trade-offs with metabolic reprogramming and antioxidant defense upregulation in long-lived strains.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on calorie restriction extending lifespan by shifting resource allocation to somatic maintenance via nutrient sensing pathways.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Details molecular and cellular mechanisms of CR including modulation of mTOR, AMPK, and SIRT1 pathways.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Calorie Restriction and Nutrient Sensing Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes CR effects on metabolism, mitochondrial function, and inflammation contributing to slowed aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Calorie Restriction and Nutrient Sensing Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Explores systems biology of CR effects on molecular pathways and organ-specific aging processes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Calorie Restriction and Nutrient Sensing Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes evolutionary basis and metabolic/neuropsychiatric effects of CR consistent with disposable soma resource reallocation.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on life-history trade-offs and terminal investment strategies linking reproduction and somatic maintenance.
